headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: payment_portfolio_name
parameters.description: The name of the Payment Portfolio.

parameters.name: advertiser_ids
parameters.description: The list of ad accounts that you want to link to the Payment Portfolio. You can only link ad accounts that belong to the same client as the Payment Portfolio. Max size: 20. If the ad account belongs to a Business Center, you need to have Finance Manager or Admin access to the Business Center. To confirm your access to a Business Center, use /bc/get/ and check the returned user_role and finance_role . If the ad account does not belong to a Business Center, you need to have Admin or Operator access to the ad account. Note : If advertiser_ids contains any invalid IDs, the whole call will fail.
